member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_ACCESSIBILITY_OUTPUT
member.summary: Contains the response to a D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_ACCESSIBILITY_ATTRIBUTES query.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_ACCESSIBILITY_OUTPUT.Output
member.summary: A structure that contains a Message Authentication Code (MAC) and other data.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_ACCESSIBILITY_OUTPUT.BusType
member.summary: A bitwise OR of flags from the enumeration.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_ACCESSIBILITY_OUTPUT.AccessibleInContiguousBlocks
member.summary: If TRUE, contiguous blocks of video memory may be accessible to the CPU or the bus.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_ACCESSIBILITY_OUTPUT.AccessibleInNonContiguousBlocks
member.summary: If TRUE, non-contiguous blocks of video memory may be accessible to the CPU or the bus.
